pokecraft.species.abomasnow.desc: A powerful Pokémon that can split huge boulders with ease. Dislikes associating with others and chooses to live quietly deep within the mountains, playing with the snow.
pokecraft.species.abomasnow.name: Abomasnow
pokecraft.species.abra.desc: Spends 18 hours of the day sleeping. Even while asleep, Abra can control its psychic powers—should danger approach, the Pokémon will simply teleport away.
pokecraft.species.abra.name: Abra
pokecraft.species.absol.desc: Because of this Pokémon’s ability to detect danger, people mistook Absol as a bringer of doom.
pokecraft.species.absol.name: Absol
pokecraft.species.accelgor.desc: Discarding its shell made it nimble. To keep itself from dehydrating, it wraps its body in bands of membrane.
pokecraft.species.accelgor.name: Accelgor
pokecraft.species.aegislash.desc: Its potent spectral powers allow it to manipulate others. It once used its powers to force people and Pokémon to build a kingdom to its liking.
pokecraft.species.aegislash.name: Aegislash
pokecraft.species.aerodactyl.desc: Aerodactyl’s sawlike fangs can shred skin to tatters—even the skin of Steel-type Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.aerodactyl.name: Aerodactyl
pokecraft.species.aggron.desc: Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He was trying to channel the Pokémon’s strength.
pokecraft.species.aggron.name: Aggron
pokecraft.species.aipom.desc: This treetop dweller possesses a tail as dexterous as a hand. Ancient writings describe this Pokémon as a one-armed oddity.
pokecraft.species.aipom.name: Aipom
pokecraft.species.alakazam.desc: The longer Alakazam lives, the larger and heavier its head becomes. Our tests have shown that the strength of its psychic powers correlates positively to the weight of its head.
pokecraft.species.alakazam.name: Alakazam
pokecraft.species.alcremie.desc: When Alcremie is content, the cream it secretes from its hands becomes sweeter and richer.
pokecraft.species.alcremie.name: Alcremie
pokecraft.species.alomomola.desc: The reason it helps Pokémon in a weakened condition is that any Pokémon coming after them may also attack Alomomola.
pokecraft.species.alomomola.name: Alomomola
pokecraft.species.altaria.desc: This Pokémon has a kind disposition, but if it’s provoked, it will threaten opponents with shrill cries before attacking them without mercy.
pokecraft.species.altaria.name: Altaria
pokecraft.species.amaura.desc: Amaura is an ancient Pokémon that has gone extinct. Specimens of this species can sometimes be found frozen in ice.
pokecraft.species.amaura.name: Amaura
pokecraft.species.ambipom.desc: To affirm their kinship, members of this species will form a ring by linking their newly doubled tails together. On rare occasions, humans have been accepted into such rings.
pokecraft.species.ambipom.name: Ambipom
pokecraft.species.amoonguss.desc: Amoonguss generally doesn’t move much. It tends to stand still near Poké Balls that have been dropped on the ground.
pokecraft.species.amoonguss.name: Amoonguss
pokecraft.species.ampharos.desc: Its tail shines bright and strong. It has been prized since long ago as a beacon for sailors.
pokecraft.species.ampharos.name: Ampharos
pokecraft.species.anorith.desc: Anorith can swim swiftly by pulling its eight wings through the water like oars on a boat. This Pokémon is an ancestor of modern bug Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.anorith.name: Anorith
pokecraft.species.appletun.desc: Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the skin on its back is especially yummy. Children used to have it as a snack.
pokecraft.species.appletun.name: Appletun
pokecraft.species.applin.desc: As soon as it’s born, it burrows into an apple. Not only does the apple serve as its food source, but the flavor of the fruit determines its evolution.
pokecraft.species.applin.name: Applin
pokecraft.species.araquanid.desc: It acts as a caretaker for Dewpider, putting them inside its bubble and letting them eat any leftover food.
pokecraft.species.araquanid.name: Araquanid
pokecraft.species.arbok.desc: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
pokecraft.species.arbok.name: Arbok
pokecraft.species.arcanine.desc: Snaps at its foes with fangs cloaked in blazing flame. Despite its bulk, it deftly feints every which way, leading opponents on a deceptively merry chase as it all but dances around them.
pokecraft.species.arcanine.name: Arcanine
pokecraft.species.arceus.desc: It is the heavenly fount from which pours the light that shines across Hisui. Its luminance guides and protects all Pokémon. Hisuian mythology states that Arceus is the creator of all things.
pokecraft.species.arceus.name: Arceus
pokecraft.species.archen.desc: Archen is said to be the ancestor of bird Pokémon. It lived in treetops, eating berries and bug Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.archen.name: Archen
pokecraft.species.archeops.desc: Though capable of flight, Archeops was apparently better at hunting on the ground.
pokecraft.species.archeops.name: Archeops
pokecraft.species.arctovish.desc: The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go extinct anyway.
pokecraft.species.arctovish.name: Arctovish
pokecraft.species.arctozolt.desc: This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and was able to preserve food with the ice on its body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.
pokecraft.species.arctozolt.name: Arctozolt
pokecraft.species.ariados.desc: It spews threads from its mouth to catch its prey. When night falls, it leaves its web to go hunt aggressively.
pokecraft.species.ariados.name: Ariados
pokecraft.species.armaldo.desc: Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.
pokecraft.species.armaldo.name: Armaldo
pokecraft.species.aromatisse.desc: The scents Aromatisse can produce range from sweet smells that bolster allies to foul smells that sap an opponent’s will to fight.
pokecraft.species.aromatisse.name: Aromatisse
pokecraft.species.aron.desc: When Aron evolves, its steel armor peels off. In ancient times, people would collect Aron’s shed armor and make good use of it in their daily lives.
pokecraft.species.aron.name: Aron
pokecraft.species.arrokuda.desc: After it’s eaten its fill, its movements become extremely sluggish. That’s when Cramorant swallows it up.
pokecraft.species.arrokuda.name: Arrokuda
pokecraft.species.articuno.desc: This Pokémon can control ice at will. Articuno is said to live in snowy mountains riddled with permafrost.
pokecraft.species.articuno.name: Articuno
pokecraft.species.audino.desc: This Pokémon has a kind heart. By touching with its feelers, Audino can gauge other creatures’ feelings and physical conditions.
pokecraft.species.audino.name: Audino
pokecraft.species.aurorus.desc: When gripped by rage, Aurorus will emanate freezing air, covering everything around it in ice.
pokecraft.species.aurorus.name: Aurorus
pokecraft.species.avalugg.desc: The armor of ice covering its lower jaw puts steel to shame and can shatter rocks with ease. This Pokémon barrels along steep mountain paths, cleaving through the deep snow.
pokecraft.species.avalugg.name: Avalugg
pokecraft.species.axew.desc: They play with each other by knocking their large tusks together. Their tusks break sometimes, but they grow back so quickly that it isn’t a concern.
pokecraft.species.axew.name: Axew
pokecraft.species.azelf.desc: The dreaded Being of Willpower. Legends tell of this Pokémon manipulating the will of its adversaries and turning them into puppets of its own.
pokecraft.species.azelf.name: Azelf
pokecraft.species.azumarill.desc: These Pokémon create air-filled bubbles. When Azurill play in rivers, Azumarill will cover them with these bubbles.
pokecraft.species.azumarill.name: Azumarill
pokecraft.species.azurill.desc: Although Azurill are normally docile, an angry one will swing around the big ball on its tail and try to smash its opponents.
pokecraft.species.azurill.name: Azurill
pokecraft.species.bagon.desc: Bagon is a solitary Pokémon that doesn’t form groups with others of its kind. It also has a head hard enough to cleave a boulder in one strike.
pokecraft.species.bagon.name: Bagon
pokecraft.species.baltoy.desc: It was discovered in ancient ruins. While moving, it constantly spins. It stands on one foot even when asleep.
pokecraft.species.baltoy.name: Baltoy
pokecraft.species.banette.desc: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.
pokecraft.species.banette.name: Banette
pokecraft.species.barbaracle.desc: Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start to act on their own to ensure the enemy’s defeat.
pokecraft.species.barbaracle.name: Barbaracle
pokecraft.species.barboach.desc: Makes its home in swamps with murky water. The poor visibility hides this Pokémon from predators, and the slime on its body makes grasping it difficult.
pokecraft.species.barboach.name: Barboach
pokecraft.species.barraskewda.desc: It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.
pokecraft.species.barraskewda.name: Barraskewda
pokecraft.species.basculegion.desc: Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species throughout all Hisui's rivers is Basculegion's equal.
pokecraft.species.basculegion.name: Basculegion
pokecraft.species.basculin.desc: Though it differs from other Basculin in several respects, including demeanor—this one is gentle—I have categorized it as a regional form given the vast array of shared qualities.
pokecraft.species.basculin.name: Basculin
pokecraft.species.bastiodon.desc: Its face is sturdy—as strong as diamond—and this hardness offers a very stable defense. Much about this species is still unknown, such as its natural habitat.
pokecraft.species.bastiodon.name: Bastiodon
pokecraft.species.bayleef.desc: Bayleef’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.
pokecraft.species.bayleef.name: Bayleef
pokecraft.species.beartic.desc: It swims energetically through frigid seas. When it gets tired, it freezes the seawater with its breath so it can rest on the ice.
pokecraft.species.beartic.name: Beartic
pokecraft.species.beautifly.desc: A colorful and incredibly beautiful but also greedy Pokémon. In an effort to keep its favorite food all to itself, it will chase away Combee as they try to gather nectar.
pokecraft.species.beautifly.name: Beautifly
pokecraft.species.beedrill.desc: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
pokecraft.species.beedrill.name: Beedrill
pokecraft.species.beheeyem.desc: Sometimes found drifting above wheat fields, this Pokémon can control the memories of its opponents.
pokecraft.species.beheeyem.name: Beheeyem
pokecraft.species.beldum.desc: The cells in this Pokémon’s body are composed of magnetic material. Instead of blood, magnetic forces flow through Beldum’s body.
pokecraft.species.beldum.name: Beldum
pokecraft.species.bellossom.desc: Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
pokecraft.species.bellossom.name: Bellossom
pokecraft.species.bellsprout.desc: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.
pokecraft.species.bellsprout.name: Bellsprout
pokecraft.species.bergmite.desc: Lives on mountains blanketed in perennial snow. It freezes water vapor in the air to make the ice helmet that it dons for defense.
pokecraft.species.bergmite.name: Bergmite
pokecraft.species.bewear.desc: The moves it uses to take down its prey would make a martial artist jealous. It tucks subdued prey under its arms to carry them to its nest.
pokecraft.species.bewear.name: Bewear
pokecraft.species.bibarel.desc: Bibarel fur repels water and is also a fantastic material for heat retention. These Pokémon create dams on rivers to live in.
pokecraft.species.bibarel.name: Bibarel
pokecraft.species.bidoof.desc: Bidoof has an unsophisticated face and is rarely flustered by anything. There have been incidents involving Bidoof sauntering into villages and gnawing on the houses without a single care.
pokecraft.species.bidoof.name: Bidoof
pokecraft.species.binacle.desc: If the two don’t work well together, both their offense and defense fall apart. Without good teamwork, they won’t survive.
pokecraft.species.binacle.name: Binacle
pokecraft.species.bisharp.desc: Violent conflicts erupt between Bisharp and Fraxure over places where sharpening stones can be found.
pokecraft.species.bisharp.name: Bisharp
pokecraft.species.blacephalon.desc: A UB that appeared from an Ultra Wormhole, it causes explosions, then takes advantage of opponents’ surprise to rob them of their vitality.
pokecraft.species.blacephalon.name: Blacephalon
pokecraft.species.blastoise.desc: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
pokecraft.species.blastoise.name: Blastoise
pokecraft.species.blaziken.desc: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.
pokecraft.species.blaziken.name: Blaziken
pokecraft.species.blipbug.desc: Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.
pokecraft.species.blipbug.name: Blipbug
pokecraft.species.blissey.desc: A kindhearted Pokémon that will care for any sick person or Pokémon until their health improves. The eggs it lays are delicious and bring good fortune to those who eat them.
pokecraft.species.blissey.name: Blissey
pokecraft.species.blitzle.desc: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use the frequency and rhythm of these flashes to communicate.
pokecraft.species.blitzle.name: Blitzle
pokecraft.species.boldore.desc: It relies on sound in order to monitor what’s in its vicinity. When angered, it will attack without ever changing the direction it’s facing.
pokecraft.species.boldore.name: Boldore
pokecraft.species.boltund.desc: It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.
pokecraft.species.boltund.name: Boltund
pokecraft.species.bonsly.desc: Its tears elicit sympathy from those who see them, but do not be deceived! This expulsion of body water is merely a physiological mechanism for keeping itself in good health.
pokecraft.species.bonsly.name: Bonsly
pokecraft.species.bouffalant.desc: These Pokémon live in herds of about 20 individuals. Bouffalant that betray the herd will lose the hair on their heads for some reason.
pokecraft.species.bouffalant.name: Bouffalant
pokecraft.species.bounsweet.desc: When under attack, it secretes a sweet and delicious sweat. The scent only calls more enemies to it.
pokecraft.species.bounsweet.name: Bounsweet
pokecraft.species.braixen.desc: When the twig is plucked from its tail, friction sets the twig alight. The flame is used to send signals to its allies.
pokecraft.species.braixen.name: Braixen
pokecraft.species.braviary.desc: Screaming a bloodcurdling battle cry, this huge and ferocious bird Pokémon goes out on the hunt. It blasts lakes with shock waves, then scoops up any prey that float to the water's surface.
pokecraft.species.braviary.name: Braviary
pokecraft.species.breloom.desc: The seeds ringing Breloom’s tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this Pokémon’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.
pokecraft.species.breloom.name: Breloom
pokecraft.species.brionne.desc: On nights when the sea is calm, Brionne dance with one another to the singing of the Primarina that’s leading them.
pokecraft.species.brionne.name: Brionne
pokecraft.species.bronzong.desc: Some believe that its bell-like cry opens holes to another world. It has been revered as a deity since ancient times.
pokecraft.species.bronzong.name: Bronzong
pokecraft.species.bronzor.desc: Floats using a mysterious energy. The pattern engraved upon its back is held as sacred and can sometimes be found in imagery from ancient cemeteries and other such timeworn places.
pokecraft.species.bronzor.name: Bronzor
pokecraft.species.bruxish.desc: Its skin is thick enough to fend off Mareanie’s spikes. With its robust teeth, Bruxish crunches up the spikes and eats them.
pokecraft.species.bruxish.name: Bruxish
pokecraft.species.budew.desc: When the sun's light strengthens, the bud atop this Pokémon's head opens. This is a sign to the people that the harsh winter is over, and the season of budding has begun.
pokecraft.species.budew.name: Budew
pokecraft.species.buizel.desc: It moves freely in the water by spinning its forked tail for propulsion. The resemblance to the screw of a steamboat is coincidental.
pokecraft.species.buizel.name: Buizel
pokecraft.species.bulbasaur.desc: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.
pokecraft.species.bulbasaur.name: Bulbasaur
pokecraft.species.buneary.desc: My hypothesis as to why Buneary rolls up its ears is that its hearing is far too keen. I surmise that the Pokémon protects its hearing by limiting the sound that may enter its ears.
pokecraft.species.buneary.name: Buneary
pokecraft.species.bunnelby.desc: It’s very sensitive to danger. The sound of Corviknight’s flapping will have Bunnelby digging a hole to hide underground in moments.
pokecraft.species.bunnelby.name: Bunnelby
pokecraft.species.burmy.desc: If its cloak is even slightly damaged, Burmy will immediately repair it with whatever is close at hand. The Pokémon within the cloak is scrawny and vulnerable to the cold.
pokecraft.species.burmy.name: Burmy
pokecraft.species.butterfree.desc: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
pokecraft.species.butterfree.name: Butterfree
pokecraft.species.buzzwole.desc: Buzzwole goes around showing off its abnormally swollen muscles. It is one kind of Ultra Beast.
pokecraft.species.buzzwole.name: Buzzwole
pokecraft.species.cacnea.desc: The more arid and harsh the environment, the more pretty and fragrant a flower Cacnea grows. This Pokémon battles by wildly swinging its thorny arms.
pokecraft.species.cacnea.name: Cacnea
pokecraft.species.cacturne.desc: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.
pokecraft.species.cacturne.name: Cacturne
pokecraft.species.calyrex.desc: Calyrex is known in legend as a king that ruled over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.
pokecraft.species.calyrex.name: Calyrex
pokecraft.species.camerupt.desc: The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
pokecraft.species.camerupt.name: Camerupt
pokecraft.species.carbink.desc: It’s said that somewhere in the world, there’s a mineral vein housing a large pack of slumbering Carbink. It’s also said that this pack has a queen.
pokecraft.species.carbink.name: Carbink
pokecraft.species.carkol.desc: By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokecraft.species.carkol.name: Carkol
pokecraft.species.carnivine.desc: Though this is a plant Pokémon, it has a gluttonous and unruly temperament. Carnivine attacks its prey with its cavernous maw wide open.
pokecraft.species.carnivine.name: Carnivine
pokecraft.species.carracosta.desc: This Pokémon emerges from the water in search of prey despite the fact that it moves more slowly on land.
pokecraft.species.carracosta.name: Carracosta
pokecraft.species.carvanha.desc: These Pokémon have sharp fangs and powerful jaws. Sailors avoid Carvanha dens at all costs.
pokecraft.species.carvanha.name: Carvanha
pokecraft.species.cascoon.desc: The silk coating its body is thin but sufficiently strong. Cascoon's silk has a luster and texture superior to that of Silcoon's, and clothes made using Cascoon silk are regarded as top-notch.
pokecraft.species.cascoon.name: Cascoon
pokecraft.species.castform.desc: Its form changes depending on the weather. The rougher conditions get, the rougher Castform’s disposition!
pokecraft.species.castform.name: Castform
pokecraft.species.caterpie.desc: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokecraft.species.caterpie.name: Caterpie
pokecraft.species.celebi.desc: This Pokémon traveled through time to come from the future. It bolsters grass and trees with its own strength, and it can heal wounds, too.
pokecraft.species.celebi.name: Celebi
pokecraft.species.celesteela.desc: Although it’s alien to this world and a danger here, it’s apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.
pokecraft.species.celesteela.name: Celesteela
pokecraft.species.centiskorch.desc: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.
pokecraft.species.centiskorch.name: Centiskorch
pokecraft.species.chandelure.desc: In homes illuminated by Chandelure instead of lights, funerals were a constant occurrence— or so it’s said.
pokecraft.species.chandelure.name: Chandelure
pokecraft.species.chansey.desc: This purehearted Pokémon shares its eggs with the injured.
pokecraft.species.chansey.name: Chansey
pokecraft.species.charizard.desc: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
pokecraft.species.charizard.name: Charizard
pokecraft.species.charjabug.desc: Its digestive processes convert the leaves it eats into electricity. An electric sac in its belly stores the electricity for later use.
pokecraft.species.charjabug.name: Charjabug
pokecraft.species.charmander.desc: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
pokecraft.species.charmander.name: Charmander
pokecraft.species.charmeleon.desc: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
pokecraft.species.charmeleon.name: Charmeleon
pokecraft.species.chatot.desc: A versatile performer skilled in the imitation of human speech. It is said that older, more experienced Chatot can even understand the meaning of the words they mimic.
pokecraft.species.chatot.name: Chatot
pokecraft.species.cherrim.desc: Motionless, save for the occasional quiver. A rich array of Pokémon can be found gathered around it, drawn by the scent exuded from Cherrim's folded petals.
pokecraft.species.cherrim.name: Cherrim
pokecraft.species.cherubi.desc: Once the fruit growing alongside the main body is large and plump, Cherubi will use the nutrients within to evolve. The fruit then detaches, becoming nourishment for other creatures.
pokecraft.species.cherubi.name: Cherubi
pokecraft.species.chesnaught.desc: When it takes a defensive posture with its fists guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.
pokecraft.species.chesnaught.name: Chesnaught
pokecraft.species.chespin.desc: Such a thick shell of wood covers its head and back that even a direct hit from a truck wouldn’t faze it.
pokecraft.species.chespin.name: Chespin
pokecraft.species.chewtle.desc: It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.
pokecraft.species.chewtle.name: Chewtle
pokecraft.species.chikorita.desc: In battle, Chikorita waves its leaf around to keep the foe at bay. However, a sweet fragrance also wafts from the leaf, becalming the battling Pokémon and creating a cozy, friendly atmosphere all around.
pokecraft.species.chikorita.name: Chikorita
pokecraft.species.chimchar.desc: Full of vigor and always in high spirits. It was once known by the name ”Lantern-Tail” and feared as some kind of apparition.
pokecraft.species.chimchar.name: Chimchar
pokecraft.species.chimecho.desc: Can emit waves of air powerful enough to knock out prey taller than itself. I hypothesize that it amplifies the faint sound of wind within its body.
pokecraft.species.chimecho.name: Chimecho
pokecraft.species.chinchou.desc: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communication is its constantly flashing lights.
pokecraft.species.chinchou.name: Chinchou
pokecraft.species.chingling.desc: This Pokémon gave me an excruciating headache when it seemingly cried out without making a sound. Perhaps there are some sounds that the human ear is simply incapable of hearing.
pokecraft.species.chingling.name: Chingling
pokecraft.species.cinccino.desc: A special oil that seeps through their fur helps them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price at market.
pokecraft.species.cinccino.name: Cinccino
pokecraft.species.cinderace.desc: It’s skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.
pokecraft.species.cinderace.name: Cinderace
pokecraft.species.clamperl.desc: Clamperl’s pearls are exceedingly precious. They can be more than 10 times as costly as Shellder’s pearls.
pokecraft.species.clamperl.name: Clamperl
pokecraft.species.clauncher.desc: By detonating gas that accumulates in its right claw, this Pokémon launches water like a bullet. This is how Clauncher defeats its enemies.
pokecraft.species.clauncher.name: Clauncher
pokecraft.species.clawitzer.desc: Clawitzer’s right arm is a cannon that launches projectiles made of seawater. Shots from a Clawitzer’s cannon arm can sink a tanker.
pokecraft.species.clawitzer.name: Clawitzer
pokecraft.species.claydol.desc: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
pokecraft.species.claydol.name: Claydol
pokecraft.species.clefable.desc: Legend says that on clear, quiet nights, it listens for the voices of its kin living on the moon. I, too, often think of my homeland, so far away.
pokecraft.species.clefable.name: Clefable
pokecraft.species.clefairy.desc: It can be found in quiet mountain areas on a full moon's night. Its dancing and its tiny, faintly glowing wings confer upon it a lovely fairylike quality.
pokecraft.species.clefairy.name: Clefairy
pokecraft.species.cleffa.desc: In silhouette, they resemble twinkling starlight. When shooting stars rain from the night sky, Cleffa gather in numbers and dance as though they are indeed incarnations of the stars.
pokecraft.species.cleffa.name: Cleffa
pokecraft.species.clobbopus.desc: Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn’t alarmed when that happens—it knows they’ll grow back. It’s about as smart as a three-year-old.
pokecraft.species.clobbopus.name: Clobbopus
pokecraft.species.cloyster.desc: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.
pokecraft.species.cloyster.name: Cloyster
pokecraft.species.coalossal.desc: While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.
pokecraft.species.coalossal.name: Coalossal
pokecraft.species.cobalion.desc: From the moment it’s born, this Pokémon radiates the air of a leader. Its presence will calm even vicious foes.
pokecraft.species.cobalion.name: Cobalion
pokecraft.species.cofagrigus.desc: There are many depictions of Cofagrigus decorating ancient tombs. They’re symbols of the wealth that kings of bygone eras had.
pokecraft.species.cofagrigus.name: Cofagrigus
pokecraft.species.combee.desc: They swear fealty to a queen Pokémon and work diligently to gather nectar. Each swarm produces a different flavor of honey.
pokecraft.species.combee.name: Combee
pokecraft.species.combusken.desc: Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This Pokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.
pokecraft.species.combusken.name: Combusken
pokecraft.species.comfey.desc: These Pokémon smell very nice. All Comfey wear different flowers, so each of these Pokémon has its own individual scent.
pokecraft.species.comfey.name: Comfey
pokecraft.species.conkeldurr.desc: When going all out, this Pokémon throws aside its concrete pillars and leaps at opponents to pummel them with its fists.
pokecraft.species.conkeldurr.name: Conkeldurr
pokecraft.species.copperajah.desc: These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.
pokecraft.species.copperajah.name: Copperajah
pokecraft.species.corphish.desc: It was originally a Pokémon from afar that escaped to the wild. It can adapt to the dirtiest river.
pokecraft.species.corphish.name: Corphish
pokecraft.species.corsola.desc: These Pokémon live in warm seas. In prehistoric times, many lived in the oceans around the Galar region as well.
pokecraft.species.corsola.name: Corsola
pokecraft.species.corviknight.desc: With their great intellect and flying skills, these Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar region’s airborne taxi service.
pokecraft.species.corviknight.name: Corviknight
pokecraft.species.corvisquire.desc: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent’s strength.
pokecraft.species.corvisquire.name: Corvisquire
pokecraft.species.cosmoem.desc: It sucks in dust from the air at an astounding rate, frantically building up energy within its core as preparation for evolution.
pokecraft.species.cosmoem.name: Cosmoem
pokecraft.species.cosmog.desc: Cosmog is very curious but not very cautious, often placing itself in danger. If things start to look dicey, it teleports away.
pokecraft.species.cosmog.name: Cosmog
pokecraft.species.cottonee.desc: Weaving together the cotton of both Cottonee and Eldegoss produces exquisite cloth that’s highly prized by many luxury brands.
pokecraft.species.cottonee.name: Cottonee
pokecraft.species.crabominable.desc: Before it stops to think, it just starts pummeling. There are records of its turning back avalanches with a flurry of punches.
pokecraft.species.crabominable.name: Crabominable
pokecraft.species.crabrawler.desc: Crabrawler has been known to mistake Exeggutor for a coconut tree and climb it. The enraged Exeggutor shakes it off and stomps it.
pokecraft.species.crabrawler.name: Crabrawler
pokecraft.species.cradily.desc: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.
pokecraft.species.cradily.name: Cradily
pokecraft.species.cramorant.desc: This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.
pokecraft.species.cramorant.name: Cramorant
pokecraft.species.cranidos.desc: An incredibly rare sight. They duel each other by ramming their heads together, and the resulting sound echoes throughout the area like the pealing of a bell.
pokecraft.species.cranidos.name: Cranidos
pokecraft.species.crawdaunt.desc: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
pokecraft.species.crawdaunt.name: Crawdaunt
pokecraft.species.cresselia.desc: Cresselia is reminiscent of the crescent moon. It leaves a brilliant line of light in its wake as it flies across the night sky. I daresay it resembles the heavenly maiden who created the Milky Way.
pokecraft.species.cresselia.name: Cresselia
pokecraft.species.croagunk.desc: A poison wielder with a dastardly personality. Despite such qualities, this species is afforded a measure of popularity due to its peculiar cry and comical features.
pokecraft.species.croagunk.name: Croagunk
pokecraft.species.crobat.desc: Its hind limbs have become another set of wings. Crobat expertly maneuvers its four wings to dart in exquisite fashion through even the most confined caves without losing any speed.
pokecraft.species.crobat.name: Crobat
pokecraft.species.crocalor.name: Crocalor
pokecraft.species.croconaw.desc: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.
pokecraft.species.croconaw.name: Croconaw
pokecraft.species.crustle.desc: Its thick claws are its greatest weapons. They’re mighty enough to crack Rhyperior’s carapace.
pokecraft.species.crustle.name: Crustle
pokecraft.species.cryogonal.desc: When the weather gets hot, these Pokémon turn into water vapor. Cryogonal are almost never seen during summer.
pokecraft.species.cryogonal.name: Cryogonal
pokecraft.species.cubchoo.desc: It sniffles before performing a move, using its frosty snot to provide an icy element to any move that needs it.
pokecraft.species.cubchoo.name: Cubchoo
pokecraft.species.cubone.desc: This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubone’s dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.
pokecraft.species.cubone.name: Cubone
pokecraft.species.cufant.desc: If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the rain, turning a vibrant green color.
pokecraft.species.cufant.name: Cufant
pokecraft.species.cursola.desc: Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You’ll become stiff as stone if you touch it.
pokecraft.species.cursola.name: Cursola
pokecraft.species.cutiefly.desc: An opponent’s aura can tell Cutiefly what that opponent’s next move will be. Then Cutiefly can glide around the attack and strike back.
pokecraft.species.cutiefly.name: Cutiefly
pokecraft.species.cyndaquil.desc: Hails from the Johto region. Though usually curled into a ball due to its timid disposition, it harbors tremendous firepower.
pokecraft.species.cyndaquil.name: Cyndaquil
pokecraft.species.darkrai.desc: On a moonless night, a strange incident occurred in which every one of a village's inhabitants suffered nightmares. The villagers attested that Darkrai appeared before them in these nightmares.
pokecraft.species.darkrai.name: Darkrai
pokecraft.species.darmanitan.desc: This Pokémon’s power level rises along with the temperature of its fire, which can reach 2,500 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokecraft.species.darmanitan.name: Darmanitan
pokecraft.species.dartrix.desc: Regularly basks in sunlight to gather power—presumably due to the frigid climate. Nonetheless, the edges of the blade quills set into its wings are keen as ever.
pokecraft.species.dartrix.name: Dartrix
pokecraft.species.darumaka.desc: This popular symbol of good fortune will never fall over in its sleep, no matter how it’s pushed or pulled.
pokecraft.species.darumaka.name: Darumaka
pokecraft.species.decidueye.desc: The air stored inside the rachises of Decidueye's feathers insulates the Pokémon against Hisui's extreme cold. This is firm proof that evolution can be influenced by environment.
pokecraft.species.decidueye.name: Decidueye
pokecraft.species.dedenne.desc: Since Dedenne can’t generate much electricity on its own, it steals electricity from outlets or other electric Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.dedenne.name: Dedenne
pokecraft.species.deerling.desc: The turning of the seasons changes the color and scent of this Pokémon’s fur. People use it to mark the seasons.
pokecraft.species.deerling.name: Deerling
pokecraft.species.deino.desc: Because it can’t see, this Pokémon is constantly biting at everything it touches, trying to keep track of its surroundings.
pokecraft.species.deino.name: Deino
pokecraft.species.delcatty.desc: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.
pokecraft.species.delcatty.name: Delcatty
pokecraft.species.delibird.desc: It has a generous habit of sharing its food with people and Pokémon, so it’s always scrounging around for more food.
pokecraft.species.delibird.name: Delibird
pokecraft.species.delphox.desc: Using psychic power, it generates a fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit, incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.
pokecraft.species.delphox.name: Delphox
pokecraft.species.deoxys.desc: Deoxys emerged from a virus that came from space. It is highly intelligent and wields psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon shoots lasers from the crystalline organ on its chest.
pokecraft.species.deoxys.name: Deoxys
pokecraft.species.dewgong.desc: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.
pokecraft.species.dewgong.name: Dewgong
pokecraft.species.dewott.desc: Its exquisite double-scalchop technique is likely the result of daily training, and it can send even masters of the blade fleeing in defeat.
pokecraft.species.dewott.name: Dewott
pokecraft.species.dewpider.desc: Dewpider normally lives underwater. When it comes onto land in search of food, it takes water with it in the form of a bubble on its head.
pokecraft.species.dewpider.name: Dewpider
pokecraft.species.dhelmise.desc: After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.
pokecraft.species.dhelmise.name: Dhelmise
pokecraft.species.dialga.desc: This Pokémon is revered as a deity in Hisuian legend. The birth of Dialga was what caused the vast river of time to begin flowing in our world.
pokecraft.species.dialga.name: Dialga
pokecraft.species.diancie.desc: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.
pokecraft.species.diancie.name: Diancie
pokecraft.species.diggersby.desc: The fur on its belly retains heat exceptionally well. People used to make heavy winter clothing from fur shed by this Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.diggersby.name: Diggersby
pokecraft.species.diglett.desc: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.
pokecraft.species.diglett.name: Diglett
pokecraft.species.ditto.desc: When it encounters another Ditto, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.
pokecraft.species.ditto.name: Ditto
pokecraft.species.dodrio.desc: One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.
pokecraft.species.dodrio.name: Dodrio
pokecraft.species.doduo.desc: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.
pokecraft.species.doduo.name: Doduo
pokecraft.species.donphan.desc: If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body, even a house could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the Pokémon helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.
pokecraft.species.donphan.name: Donphan
pokecraft.species.dottler.desc: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.
pokecraft.species.dottler.name: Dottler
pokecraft.species.doublade.desc: The two swords employ a strategy of rapidly alternating between offense and defense to bring down their prey.
pokecraft.species.doublade.name: Doublade
pokecraft.species.dracovish.desc: Its mighty legs are capable of running at speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon can’t breathe unless it’s underwater.
pokecraft.species.dracovish.name: Dracovish
pokecraft.species.dracozolt.desc: The powerful muscles in its tail generate its electricity. Compared to its lower body, its upper half is entirely too small.
pokecraft.species.dracozolt.name: Dracozolt
pokecraft.species.dragalge.desc: Dragalge generates dragon energy by sticking the plume on its head out above the ocean’s surface and bathing it in sunlight.
pokecraft.species.dragalge.name: Dragalge
pokecraft.species.dragapult.desc: Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.
pokecraft.species.dragapult.name: Dragapult
pokecraft.species.dragonair.desc: This Pokémon gathers power in the orbs on its tail and controls the weather. When enshrouded by an aura, Dragonair has a mystical appearance.
pokecraft.species.dragonair.name: Dragonair
pokecraft.species.dragonite.desc: This Pokémon is known as the Sea Incarnate. Figureheads that resemble Dragonite decorate the bows of many ships.
pokecraft.species.dragonite.name: Dragonite
pokecraft.species.drakloak.desc: Without a Dreepy to place on its head and care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.
pokecraft.species.drakloak.name: Drakloak
pokecraft.species.drampa.desc: Drampa is a kind and friendly Pokémon—up until it’s angered. When that happens, it stirs up a gale and flattens everything around.
pokecraft.species.drampa.name: Drampa
pokecraft.species.drapion.desc: Has a brutish, ferocious temperament. With immense strength and a sturdy shell off which swords will bounce, it rampages about and wreaks havoc.
pokecraft.species.drapion.name: Drapion
pokecraft.species.dratini.desc: This Pokémon was long considered to be no more than a myth. The small lump on a Dratini’s forehead is actually a horn that’s still coming in.
pokecraft.species.dratini.name: Dratini
pokecraft.species.drednaw.desc: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.
pokecraft.species.drednaw.name: Drednaw
pokecraft.species.dreepy.desc: If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.
pokecraft.species.dreepy.name: Dreepy
pokecraft.species.drifblim.desc: It drifts along at dusk, perfectly silent. Its transient, melancholy aspect touches some people deeply—every so often, one will come upon a song or poem devoted to Drifblim.
pokecraft.species.drifblim.name: Drifblim
pokecraft.species.drifloon.desc: Said to lure away young children and carry them off to the afterlife. Some whisper that Drifloon are formed of reincarnated human souls, but these rumors are as yet unconfirmed.
pokecraft.species.drifloon.name: Drifloon
pokecraft.species.drilbur.desc: It’s a digger, using its claws to burrow through the ground. It causes damage to vegetable crops, so many farmers have little love for it.
pokecraft.species.drilbur.name: Drilbur
pokecraft.species.drizzile.desc: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.
pokecraft.species.drizzile.name: Drizzile
pokecraft.species.drowzee.desc: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past.
pokecraft.species.drowzee.name: Drowzee
pokecraft.species.druddigon.desc: Druddigon are vicious and cunning. They take up residence in nests dug out by other Pokémon, treating the stolen nests as their own lairs.
pokecraft.species.druddigon.name: Druddigon
pokecraft.species.dubwool.desc: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.
pokecraft.species.dubwool.name: Dubwool
pokecraft.species.ducklett.desc: They are better at swimming than flying, and they happily eat their favorite food, peat moss, as they dive underwater.
pokecraft.species.ducklett.name: Ducklett
pokecraft.species.dugtrio.desc: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it’s like underground.
pokecraft.species.dugtrio.name: Dugtrio
pokecraft.species.dunsparce.desc: The nests Dunsparce live in are mazes of tunnels. They never get lost in their own nests—they can tell where they are by the scent of the dirt.
pokecraft.species.dunsparce.name: Dunsparce
pokecraft.species.duosion.desc: Its brain has split into two, and the two halves rarely think alike. Its actions are utterly unpredictable.
pokecraft.species.duosion.name: Duosion
pokecraft.species.duraludon.desc: The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.
pokecraft.species.duraludon.name: Duraludon
pokecraft.species.durant.desc: With their large mandibles, these Pokémon can crunch their way through rock. They work together to protect their eggs from Sandaconda.
pokecraft.species.durant.name: Durant
pokecraft.species.dusclops.desc: There are rumors that peeking inside its bandage-wrapped body will cause one to get pulled in through the gaps between the bandages, never to return. I've been too scared to verify.
pokecraft.species.dusclops.name: Dusclops
pokecraft.species.dusknoir.desc: Comes to those whose lives have come to an end and escorts their souls to the afterlife. Known to mistakenly take the souls of those who yet have life left in them, albeit rarely.
pokecraft.species.dusknoir.name: Dusknoir
pokecraft.species.duskull.desc: I've heard that the children of Hisui all begin to behave once they've been told the story of how this Pokémon roams about before the witching hour to spirit away misbehaving children.
pokecraft.species.duskull.name: Duskull
pokecraft.species.dustox.desc: Tends to be drawn to bonfires on dark nights. Difficult to chase away from settlements because of the way it scatters highly toxic scales.
pokecraft.species.dustox.name: Dustox
pokecraft.species.dwebble.desc: It first tries to find a rock to live in, but if there are no suitable rocks to be found, Dwebble may move in to the ports of a Hippowdon.
pokecraft.species.dwebble.name: Dwebble
pokecraft.species.eelektrik.desc: These Pokémon have a big appetite. When they spot their prey, they attack it and paralyze it with electricity.
pokecraft.species.eelektrik.name: Eelektrik
pokecraft.species.eelektross.desc: They crawl out of the ocean using their arms. They will attack prey on shore and immediately drag it into the ocean.
pokecraft.species.eelektross.name: Eelektross
pokecraft.species.eevee.desc: Harbors the potential to evolve into manifold forms. Within Eevee lies the key to the mysteries of Pokémon evolution—I'm certain of it.
pokecraft.species.eevee.name: Eevee
pokecraft.species.eiscue.desc: This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single hair into the sea to lure in prey.
pokecraft.species.eiscue.name: Eiscue
pokecraft.species.ekans.desc: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
pokecraft.species.ekans.name: Ekans
pokecraft.species.eldegoss.desc: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar regional specialty.
pokecraft.species.eldegoss.name: Eldegoss
pokecraft.species.electabuzz.desc: Feeds on electrical energy. During sudden showers beneath looming thunderclouds, one can observe Electabuzz scaling tall trees, where the Pokémon will then wait for lightning to strike.
pokecraft.species.electabuzz.name: Electabuzz
pokecraft.species.electivire.desc: Its evolution was induced by an unusual item, and its electrical output rises along with its heart rate. From its tails, it can unleash an electric current measuring 20,000 volts.
pokecraft.species.electivire.name: Electivire
pokecraft.species.electrike.desc: It stores electricity in its fur. It gives off sparks from all over its body in seasons when the air is dry.
pokecraft.species.electrike.name: Electrike
pokecraft.species.electrode.desc: The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in composition to an Apricorn. When irritated, this Pokémon lets loose an electric current equal to 20 lightning bolts.
pokecraft.species.electrode.name: Electrode
pokecraft.species.elekid.desc: They generate electricity by spinning their arms. During a thunderstorm, if one hears the lively voices of children out in the wilderness, what one is actually hearing are the voices of Elekid.
pokecraft.species.elekid.name: Elekid
pokecraft.species.elgyem.desc: This Pokémon was discovered about 50 years ago. Its highly developed brain enables it to exert its psychic powers.
pokecraft.species.elgyem.name: Elgyem
pokecraft.species.emboar.desc: It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves. It grows a beard of fire.
pokecraft.species.emboar.name: Emboar
pokecraft.species.emolga.desc: This Pokémon absolutely loves sweet berries. Sometimes it stuffs its cheeks full of so much food that it can’t fly properly.
pokecraft.species.emolga.name: Emolga
pokecraft.species.empoleon.desc: Since ancient times, it has been revered by the people of Hisui, who call it the Master of the Waves. Its wings are a match for even master-crafted blades.
pokecraft.species.empoleon.name: Empoleon
pokecraft.species.enamorus.desc: When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon's love gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.
pokecraft.species.enamorus.name: Enamorus
pokecraft.species.entei.desc: Entei embodies the passion of magma. This Pokémon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano. It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
pokecraft.species.entei.name: Entei
pokecraft.species.escavalier.desc: It charges its enemies, lances at the ready. An image of one of its duels is captured in a famous painting of Escavalier clashing with Sirfetch’d.
pokecraft.species.escavalier.name: Escavalier
pokecraft.species.espeon.desc: Wields an arcane power with which it can predict the weather and even people's thoughts. When bathed in sunshine, the scarlet orb on its brow glows and builds energy.
pokecraft.species.espeon.name: Espeon
pokecraft.species.espurr.desc: There’s enough psychic power in Espurr to send a wrestler flying, but because this power can’t be controlled, Espurr finds it troublesome.
pokecraft.species.espurr.name: Espurr
pokecraft.species.eternatus.desc: It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years ago. There seems to be a connection between this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.
pokecraft.species.eternatus.name: Eternatus
pokecraft.species.excadrill.desc: Known as the Drill King, this Pokémon can tunnel through the terrain at speeds of over 90 mph.
pokecraft.species.excadrill.name: Excadrill
pokecraft.species.exeggcute.desc: These Pokémon get nervous when they’re not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.
pokecraft.species.exeggcute.name: Exeggcute
pokecraft.species.exeggutor.desc: When they work together, Exeggutor’s three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokémon sluggish.
pokecraft.species.exeggutor.name: Exeggutor
pokecraft.species.exploud.desc: This Pokémon can do more than just shout. To communicate with others of its kind, it’ll emit all sorts of sounds from the holes in its body.
pokecraft.species.exploud.name: Exploud
pokecraft.species.falinks.desc: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.
pokecraft.species.falinks.name: Falinks
pokecraft.species.farfetchd.desc: They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all of them use it in the same way. Several distinct styles of stalk fighting have been observed.
pokecraft.species.farfetchd.name: Farfetch’d
pokecraft.species.fearow.desc: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
pokecraft.species.fearow.name: Fearow
pokecraft.species.feebas.desc: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. However, it is very hardy and can survive on little water.
pokecraft.species.feebas.name: Feebas
pokecraft.species.fennekin.desc: As it walks, it munches on a twig in place of a snack. It intimidates opponents by puffing hot air out of its ears.
pokecraft.species.fennekin.name: Fennekin
pokecraft.species.feraligatr.desc: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
pokecraft.species.feraligatr.name: Feraligatr
pokecraft.species.ferroseed.desc: Mossy caves are their preferred dwellings. Enzymes contained in mosses help Ferroseed’s spikes grow big and strong.
pokecraft.species.ferroseed.name: Ferroseed
pokecraft.species.ferrothorn.desc: Its spikes are harder than steel. This Pokémon crawls across rock walls by stabbing the spikes on its feelers into the stone.
pokecraft.species.ferrothorn.name: Ferrothorn
pokecraft.species.finneon.desc: What a gorgeous sight this Pokémon is as it swims with its long, pink-painted caudal fins fluttering behind it. Finneon's beautiful appearance has led to its nickname, "finery fish."
pokecraft.species.finneon.name: Finneon
pokecraft.species.flaaffy.desc: It stores electricity in its fluffy fleece. If it stores up too much, it will start to go bald in those patches.
pokecraft.species.flaaffy.name: Flaaffy
pokecraft.species.flabebe.desc: Flabébé wears a crown made from pollen it’s collected from its flower. The crown has hidden healing properties.
pokecraft.species.flabebe.name: Flabébé
pokecraft.species.flapple.desc: It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.
pokecraft.species.flapple.name: Flapple
pokecraft.species.flareon.desc: Flames burn within a saclike organ inside this Pokémon. When Flareon inhales, these flames grow in intensity, reaching a mighty 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
pokecraft.species.flareon.name: Flareon
pokecraft.species.fletchinder.desc: Fletchinder are exceedingly territorial and aggressive. These Pokémon fight among themselves over feeding grounds.
pokecraft.species.fletchinder.name: Fletchinder
pokecraft.species.fletchling.desc: When this Pokémon gets excited, its body temperature increases sharply. If you touch a Fletchling with bare hands, you might get burned.
pokecraft.species.fletchling.name: Fletchling
pokecraft.species.floatzel.desc: Has a long, rather splendid flotation sac, which prevents Floatzel from drowning even in stormy seas. One might glimpse this species around fishing hamlets from time to time.
pokecraft.species.floatzel.name: Floatzel
pokecraft.species.floette.desc: It gives its own power to flowers, pouring its heart into caring for them. Floette never forgives anyone who messes up a flower bed.
pokecraft.species.floette.name: Floette
pokecraft.species.floragato.name: Floragato
pokecraft.species.florges.desc: Its life can span several hundred years. It’s said to devote its entire life to protecting gardens.
pokecraft.species.florges.name: Florges
pokecraft.species.flygon.desc: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.
pokecraft.species.flygon.name: Flygon
pokecraft.species.fomantis.desc: During the day, Fomantis basks in sunlight and sleeps peacefully. It wakes and moves around at night.
pokecraft.species.fomantis.name: Fomantis
pokecraft.species.foongus.desc: The spores released from this Pokémon’s hands are highly poisonous, but when thoroughly dried, the spores can be used as stomach medicine.
pokecraft.species.foongus.name: Foongus
pokecraft.species.forretress.desc: In the moment that it gulps down its prey, the inside of its shell is exposed, but to this day, no one has ever seen that sight.
pokecraft.species.forretress.name: Forretress
pokecraft.species.fraxure.desc: Its skin is as hard as a suit of armor. Fraxure’s favorite strategy is to tackle its opponents, stabbing them with its tusks at the same time.
pokecraft.species.fraxure.name: Fraxure
pokecraft.species.frillish.desc: Legend has it that the residents of a sunken ancient city changed into these Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.frillish.name: Frillish
pokecraft.species.froakie.desc: It protects its skin by covering its body in delicate bubbles. Beneath its happy-go-lucky air, it keeps a watchful eye on its surroundings.
pokecraft.species.froakie.name: Froakie
pokecraft.species.frogadier.desc: Its swiftness is unparalleled. It can scale a tower of more than 2,000 feet in a minute’s time.
pokecraft.species.frogadier.name: Frogadier
pokecraft.species.froslass.desc: A Pokémon inhabited by the soul of a woman who died bearing a grudge in the snowy mountains. Legends of Froslass placing deathly curses on misbehaving men send shivers down my spine.
pokecraft.species.froslass.name: Froslass
pokecraft.species.frosmoth.desc: It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.
pokecraft.species.frosmoth.name: Frosmoth
pokecraft.species.fuecoco.name: Fuecoco
pokecraft.species.furfrou.desc: Left alone, its fur will grow longer and longer, but it will only allow someone it trusts to cut it.
pokecraft.species.furfrou.name: Furfrou
pokecraft.species.furret.desc: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.
pokecraft.species.furret.name: Furret
pokecraft.species.gabite.desc: Though Gabite are usually of a violent disposition, when I gave one a glass bead it had been eyeing covetously, it suddenly became quite docile.
pokecraft.species.gabite.name: Gabite
pokecraft.species.gallade.desc: The blades extending from its elbows are sharper than the finest swords. Its swordsmanship, albeit self-taught, is astonishingly impressive.
pokecraft.species.gallade.name: Gallade
pokecraft.species.galvantula.desc: It lays traps of electrified threads near the nests of bird Pokémon, aiming to snare chicks that are not yet good at flying.
pokecraft.species.galvantula.name: Galvantula
pokecraft.species.garbodor.desc: The toxic liquid it launches from its right arm is so virulent that it can kill a weakened creature instantly.
pokecraft.species.garbodor.name: Garbodor
pokecraft.species.garchomp.desc: Soars across the heavens at blinding speed—a magnificent sight! It has a feral disposition. Utmost caution is required if one meets a Garchomp out in the wilds.
pokecraft.species.garchomp.name: Garchomp
pokecraft.species.gardevoir.desc: It will dedicate itself to defending a master it has come to adore. Its pure white dress, reminiscent of those worn by ladies of nobility, is the dress of one who is willing to risk their life.
pokecraft.species.gardevoir.name: Gardevoir
pokecraft.species.gastly.desc: Gaseous and completely impalpable. Also highly dangerous— inhaling part of its poisonous body will cause one to faint instantly.
pokecraft.species.gastly.name: Gastly
pokecraft.species.gastrodon.desc: Eats beach sand for nourishment. Should one Gastrodon encounter another of a different color, a fierce battle will inevitably ensue.
pokecraft.species.gastrodon.name: Gastrodon
pokecraft.species.genesect.desc: This Pokémon existed 300 million years ago. Team Plasma altered it and attached a cannon to its back.
pokecraft.species.genesect.name: Genesect
pokecraft.species.gengar.desc: Possesses potential victims' shadows in an effort to steal away the victims' lives. If your shadow begins to laugh, you must take hold of a protective charm posthaste!
pokecraft.species.gengar.name: Gengar
pokecraft.species.geodude.desc: Makes its home in mountainous regions, using its arms to climb along harsh mountain roads. Can be troublesome—carelessly kicking one will cause it to fly into a rage and chase after you.
pokecraft.species.geodude.name: Geodude
pokecraft.species.gible.desc: It nests in caves untouched by sunlight. Its sharp teeth may fall out when worn away or after an impact, but they regrow within a few days.
pokecraft.species.gible.name: Gible
pokecraft.species.gigalith.desc: Although its energy blasts can blow away a dump truck, they have a limitation— they can only be fired when the sun is out.
pokecraft.species.gigalith.name: Gigalith
pokecraft.species.girafarig.desc: Girafarig’s rear head contains a tiny brain that is too small for thinking. However, the rear head doesn’t need to sleep, so it can keep watch over its surroundings 24 hours a day.
pokecraft.species.girafarig.name: Girafarig
pokecraft.species.giratina.desc: There is one Hisuian verse that tells of a powerful light creating a deep shadow. I imagine that this deep shadow is Giratina.
pokecraft.species.giratina.name: Giratina
pokecraft.species.glaceon.desc: Glaceon is able to lower its body temperature very quickly. It freezes the atmosphere, creating diamond dust that glitters like gems while it flutters and dances around.
pokecraft.species.glaceon.name: Glaceon
pokecraft.species.glalie.desc: It covers its body with an armor of ice harder than steel. Uses its breath to freeze prey, which it then devours as if they were frozen desserts.
pokecraft.species.glalie.name: Glalie
pokecraft.species.glameow.desc: Bewitches humans with its helical tail and piercing gaze. Its hidden claws are quite sharp as well, making this Pokémon an exceedingly tricky opponent if antagonized.
pokecraft.species.glameow.name: Glameow
pokecraft.species.glastrier.desc: Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.
pokecraft.species.glastrier.name: Glastrier
pokecraft.species.gligar.desc: Its tail is tipped by a thick, horrible stinger. To bring down prey, it will first obscure their vision by covering their faces with its body, and then it will use the stinger to inject them with venom.
pokecraft.species.gligar.name: Gligar
pokecraft.species.gliscor.desc: It glides soundlessly on pitch-black wings and sinks sharp fangs into the throat of its prey. It takes on a look of satisfaction once it has entirely drained its prey of blood.
pokecraft.species.gliscor.name: Gliscor
pokecraft.species.gloom.desc: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.
pokecraft.species.gloom.name: Gloom
pokecraft.species.gogoat.desc: They inhabit mountainous regions. The leader of the herd is decided by a battle of clashing horns.
pokecraft.species.gogoat.name: Gogoat
pokecraft.species.golbat.desc: It sinks its sharp fangs into other creatures and slurps up their blood. A closer look at the fangs reveals that they are hollow and akin to straws.
pokecraft.species.golbat.name: Golbat
pokecraft.species.goldeen.desc: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.
pokecraft.species.goldeen.name: Goldeen
pokecraft.species.golduck.desc: Its body is strong, and it has webbing on its hands and feet. Golduck can swim easily through rough seas, clawing its way through the high waves.
pokecraft.species.golduck.name: Golduck
pokecraft.species.golem.desc: The rocklike shell is shed each year. The cast-off shell then crumbles, reverting to a mass of soil, which can be spread across fields to promote crop growth.
pokecraft.species.golem.name: Golem
pokecraft.species.golett.desc: This Pokémon was created from clay. It received orders from its master many thousands of years ago, and it still follows those orders to this day.
pokecraft.species.golett.name: Golett
pokecraft.species.golisopod.desc: They live in sunken ships or in holes in the seabed. When Golisopod and Grapploct battle, the loser becomes the winner’s meal.
pokecraft.species.golisopod.name: Golisopod
pokecraft.species.golurk.desc: There’s a theory that inside Golurk is a perpetual motion machine that produces limitless energy, but this belief hasn’t been proven.
pokecraft.species.golurk.name: Golurk
pokecraft.species.goodra.desc: Able to freely control the hardness of its metallic shell. It loathes solitude and is extremely clingy—it will fume and run riot if those dearest to it ever leave its side.
pokecraft.species.goodra.name: Goodra
pokecraft.species.goomy.desc: Goomy hides away in the shade of trees, where it's nice and humid. If the slime coating its body dries out, the Pokémon instantly becomes lethargic.
pokecraft.species.goomy.name: Goomy
pokecraft.species.gorebyss.desc: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.gorebyss.name: Gorebyss
pokecraft.species.gossifleur.desc: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.
pokecraft.species.gossifleur.name: Gossifleur
pokecraft.species.gothita.desc: Even when nobody seems to be around, Gothita can still be heard making a muted cry. Many believe it’s speaking to something only it can see.
pokecraft.species.gothita.name: Gothita
pokecraft.species.gothitelle.desc: A criminal who was shown his fate by a Gothitelle went missing that same day and was never seen again.
pokecraft.species.gothitelle.name: Gothitelle
pokecraft.species.gothorita.desc: On nights when the stars shine, this Pokémon’s psychic power is at its strongest. It’s unknown just what link Gothorita has to the greater universe.
pokecraft.species.gothorita.name: Gothorita
pokecraft.species.gourgeist.desc: In the darkness of a new-moon night, Gourgeist will come knocking. Whoever answers the door will be swept off to the afterlife.
pokecraft.species.gourgeist.name: Gourgeist
pokecraft.species.granbull.desc: Although it’s popular with young people, Granbull is timid and sensitive, so it’s totally incompetent as a watchdog.
pokecraft.species.granbull.name: Granbull
pokecraft.species.grapploct.desc: Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.
pokecraft.species.grapploct.name: Grapploct
pokecraft.species.graveler.desc: Dwells in holes dug into sheer walls of stone. It enjoys rolling down slopes as though it were a boulder during a rockfall, so keep an eye upward while traversing mountain roads.
pokecraft.species.graveler.name: Graveler
pokecraft.species.greedent.desc: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.
pokecraft.species.greedent.name: Greedent
pokecraft.species.greninja.desc: It appears and vanishes with a ninja’s grace. It toys with its enemies using swift movements, while slicing them with throwing stars of sharpest water.
pokecraft.species.greninja.name: Greninja
pokecraft.species.grimer.desc: Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds won’t grow in its path.
pokecraft.species.grimer.name: Grimer
pokecraft.species.grimmsnarl.desc: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.
pokecraft.species.grimmsnarl.name: Grimmsnarl
pokecraft.species.grookey.desc: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.
pokecraft.species.grookey.name: Grookey
pokecraft.species.grotle.desc: Appears where there is clean spring water. The fruit that grows on the shrubs on its shell is sweet, nutritious, and truly delicious.
pokecraft.species.grotle.name: Grotle
pokecraft.species.groudon.desc: Through Primal Reversion and with nature’s full power, it will take back its true form. It can cause magma to erupt and expand the landmass of the world.
pokecraft.species.groudon.name: Groudon
pokecraft.species.grovyle.desc: This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.
pokecraft.species.grovyle.name: Grovyle
pokecraft.species.growlithe.desc: They patrol their territory in pairs. I believe the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.
pokecraft.species.growlithe.name: Growlithe
pokecraft.species.grubbin.desc: It uses its big jaws to dig nests into the forest floor, and it loves to feed on sweet tree sap.
pokecraft.species.grubbin.name: Grubbin
pokecraft.species.grumpig.desc: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.
pokecraft.species.grumpig.name: Grumpig
pokecraft.species.gulpin.desc: Most of Gulpin’s body is made up of its stomach—its heart and brain are very small in comparison. This Pokémon’s stomach contains special enzymes that dissolve anything.
pokecraft.species.gulpin.name: Gulpin
pokecraft.species.gumshoos.desc: Patient by nature, this Pokémon loses control of itself and pounces when it spots its favorite meal—Rattata!
pokecraft.species.gumshoos.name: Gumshoos
pokecraft.species.gurdurr.desc: Gurdurr excels at demolition—construction is not its forte. In any case, there’s skill in the way this Pokémon wields its metal beam.
pokecraft.species.gurdurr.name: Gurdurr
pokecraft.species.guzzlord.desc: An unknown life-form called a UB. It may be constantly hungry—it is certainly always devouring something.
pokecraft.species.guzzlord.name: Guzzlord
pokecraft.species.gyarados.desc: I suspect this Pokémon to be the true identity of a dragon written of in ancient texts, which claimed that it razed an entire village with white-hot beams from its maw.
pokecraft.species.gyarados.name: Gyarados
pokecraft.species.hakamoo.desc: Before attacking its enemies, it clashes its scales together and roars. Its sharp claws shred the opposition.
pokecraft.species.hakamoo.name: Hakamo-o
pokecraft.species.happiny.desc: In imitation of Chansey, it keeps a round stone tucked into its belly pouch and cherishes it dearly. It gets along well with children and will sometimes play house with them for fun.
pokecraft.species.happiny.name: Happiny
pokecraft.species.hariyama.desc: Hariyama that are big and fat aren’t necessarily strong. There are some small ones that move nimbly and use moves skillfully.
pokecraft.species.hariyama.name: Hariyama
pokecraft.species.hatenna.desc: If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.
pokecraft.species.hatenna.name: Hatenna
pokecraft.species.hatterene.desc: If you’re too loud around it, you risk being torn apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon is also known as the Forest Witch.
pokecraft.species.hatterene.name: Hatterene
pokecraft.species.hattrem.desc: Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to get them to quiet down. One blow from those braids would knock out a professional boxer.
pokecraft.species.hattrem.name: Hattrem
pokecraft.species.haunter.desc: This frightful, malevolent spirit can glide through walls, appearing wherever it likes. According to rumor, victims of a Haunter's lick will wither to death day by day.
pokecraft.species.haunter.name: Haunter
pokecraft.species.hawlucha.desc: It always strikes a pose before going for its finishing move. Sometimes opponents take advantage of that time to counterattack.
pokecraft.species.hawlucha.name: Hawlucha
pokecraft.species.haxorus.desc: While usually kindhearted, it can be terrifying if angered. Tusks that can slice through steel beams are how Haxorus deals with its adversaries.
pokecraft.species.haxorus.name: Haxorus
pokecraft.species.heatmor.desc: A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour their insides.
pokecraft.species.heatmor.name: Heatmor
pokecraft.species.heatran.desc: Stories tell of this Pokémon being birthed from the boiling magma within Mount Coronet. Its molten-steel body holds many mysteries.
pokecraft.species.heatran.name: Heatran
pokecraft.species.heliolisk.desc: One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill outspread is all it would take to produce enough electricity to power a city.
pokecraft.species.heliolisk.name: Heliolisk
pokecraft.species.helioptile.desc: The sun powers this Pokémon’s electricity generation. Interruption of that process stresses Helioptile to the point of weakness.
pokecraft.species.helioptile.name: Helioptile
pokecraft.species.heracross.desc: This Pokémon has an unparalleled horn. Heracross itself demonstrates tremendous power—it's capable of throwing several people trained in the traditional arts of war at once.
pokecraft.species.heracross.name: Heracross
pokecraft.species.herdier.desc: The black fur that covers this Pokémon’s body is dense and springy. Even sharp fangs bounce right off.
pokecraft.species.herdier.name: Herdier
pokecraft.species.hippopotas.desc: Though large and languid, Hippopotas is difficult to detect due to its tendency to burrow into and lurk beneath the soil. When agitated or excited, it expels sand from its nostrils.
pokecraft.species.hippopotas.name: Hippopotas
pokecraft.species.hippowdon.desc: Short-tempered and easily moved to violence. It whips up whirlwinds of sand to crush its foes' spirits, then goes in for the attack.
pokecraft.species.hippowdon.name: Hippowdon
pokecraft.species.hitmonchan.desc: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
pokecraft.species.hitmonchan.name: Hitmonchan
pokecraft.species.hitmonlee.desc: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
pokecraft.species.hitmonlee.name: Hitmonlee
pokecraft.species.hitmontop.desc: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.
pokecraft.species.hitmontop.name: Hitmontop
pokecraft.species.honchkrow.desc: One cry from this Pokémon, and a murder of Murkrow come flying. At such times, one would think the curtain of night had fallen, plunging the world into jet-black darkness.
pokecraft.species.honchkrow.name: Honchkrow
pokecraft.species.honedge.desc: The blue eye on the sword’s handguard is the true body of Honedge. With its old cloth, it drains people’s lives away.
pokecraft.species.honedge.name: Honedge
pokecraft.species.hooh.desc: Ho-Oh’s feathers glow in seven colors depending on the angle at which they are struck by light. These feathers are said to bring happiness to the bearers. This Pokémon is said to live at the foot of a rainbow.
pokecraft.species.hooh.name: Ho-Oh
pokecraft.species.hoopa.desc: It is said to be able to seize anything it desires with its six rings and six huge arms. With its power sealed, it is transformed into a much smaller form.
pokecraft.species.hoopa.name: Hoopa
pokecraft.species.hoothoot.desc: It begins to hoot at the same time every day. Some Trainers use them in place of clocks.
pokecraft.species.hoothoot.name: Hoothoot
pokecraft.species.hoppip.desc: This Pokémon drifts and floats with the wind. If it senses the approach of strong winds, Hoppip links its leaves with other Hoppip to prepare against being blown away.
pokecraft.species.hoppip.name: Hoppip
pokecraft.species.horsea.desc: They swim with dance-like motions and cause whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.
pokecraft.species.horsea.name: Horsea
pokecraft.species.houndoom.desc: Identifiable by its eerie howls, people a long time ago thought it was the grim reaper and feared it.
pokecraft.species.houndoom.name: Houndoom
pokecraft.species.houndour.desc: They make repeated eerie howls before dawn to call attention to their pack.
pokecraft.species.houndour.name: Houndour
pokecraft.species.huntail.desc: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.
pokecraft.species.huntail.name: Huntail
pokecraft.species.hydreigon.desc: The three heads take turns sinking their teeth into the opponent. Their attacks won’t slow until their target goes down.
pokecraft.species.hydreigon.name: Hydreigon
pokecraft.species.hypno.desc: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
pokecraft.species.hypno.name: Hypno
pokecraft.species.igglybuff.desc: Taking advantage of the softness of its body, Igglybuff moves as if bouncing. Its body turns a deep pink when its temperature rises.
pokecraft.species.igglybuff.name: Igglybuff
pokecraft.species.illumise.desc: Illumise leads a flight of illuminated Volbeat to draw signs in the night sky. This Pokémon is said to earn greater respect from its peers by composing more complex designs in the sky.
pokecraft.species.illumise.name: Illumise
pokecraft.species.impidimp.desc: It sneaks into people’s homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.
pokecraft.species.impidimp.name: Impidimp
pokecraft.species.incineroar.desc: Incineroar’s rough and aggressive behavior is its most notable trait, but the way it helps out small Pokémon shows that it has a kind side as well.
pokecraft.species.incineroar.name: Incineroar
pokecraft.species.indeedee.desc: Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the source of its strength.
pokecraft.species.indeedee.name: Indeedee
pokecraft.species.infernape.desc: A tall, hardy Pokémon with a dazzling appearance. It shrouds itself in flame and battles as if engaged in dance—truly a sight to behold.
pokecraft.species.infernape.name: Infernape
pokecraft.species.inkay.desc: By exposing foes to the blinking of its luminescent spots, Inkay demoralizes them, and then it seizes the chance to flee.
pokecraft.species.inkay.name: Inkay
pokecraft.species.inteleon.desc: Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes’ weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.
pokecraft.species.inteleon.name: Inteleon
pokecraft.species.ivysaur.desc: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
pokecraft.species.ivysaur.name: Ivysaur
pokecraft.species.jangmoo.desc: Jangmo-o strikes its scales to communicate with others of its kind. Its scales are actually fur that’s become as hard as metal.
pokecraft.species.jangmoo.name: Jangmo-o
pokecraft.species.jellicent.desc: Whenever a full moon hangs in the night sky, schools of Jellicent gather near the surface of the sea, waiting for their prey to appear.
pokecraft.species.jellicent.name: Jellicent
pokecraft.species.jigglypuff.desc: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.
pokecraft.species.jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
pokecraft.species.jirachi.desc: It’s believed that when this Pokémon wakes from its 1,000-year slumber, it will grant any wishes written on the notes attached to its head.
pokecraft.species.jirachi.name: Jirachi
pokecraft.species.jolteon.desc: Bristles its fur into sharp, needlelike points when enraged. One can hear electricity crackle in its breath when it exhales.
pokecraft.species.jolteon.name: Jolteon
pokecraft.species.joltik.desc: Joltik latch on to other Pokémon and suck out static electricity. They’re often found sticking to Yamper’s hindquarters.
pokecraft.species.joltik.name: Joltik
pokecraft.species.jumpluff.desc: Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.
pokecraft.species.jumpluff.name: Jumpluff
pokecraft.species.jynx.desc: The Jynx of Galar often have beautiful and delicate voices. Some of these Pokémon have even gathered a fan base.
pokecraft.species.jynx.name: Jynx
pokecraft.species.kabuto.desc: While some say this species has gone extinct, Kabuto sightings are apparently fairly common in some places.
pokecraft.species.kabuto.name: Kabuto
pokecraft.species.kabutops.desc: The cause behind the extinction of this species is unknown. Kabutops were aggressive Pokémon that inhabited warm seas.
pokecraft.species.kabutops.name: Kabutops
